title: RBI cancels registration certificates of 2 NBFCs for irregular lending practices
description: Hyderabad-based Star Finserv India was offering the service under 'Progcap' (owned and operated by Desiderata Impact Ventures Private Limited). Polytex India, headquartered in Mumbai, was providing services under the 'Z2P' mobile application (owned and operated by Zaitech Technologies Private Limited).
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
